amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of State to conduct a cost-benefit analysis in conjunction with all appropriate Federal departments and agencies on how to best use American security assistance dollars to thwart alien smuggling, trafficking in persons, and possible terrorists entering into the U.S. from Ecuador.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in Part B of House Report 109-175 to require the Secretary of State to conduct a cost-benefit analysis in conjunction with all appropriate Federal departments and agencies on how to best use American security assistance dollars to thwart alien smuggling, trafficking in person, and possible terrorists entering from Ecuador.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burton (IN) amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
